summary.para: The HTTP_STATE_INFO structure is used to enable or disable a Server Session or URL Group.
This structure must be used when setting or querying the on a URL Group or Server Session.

member.name: HTTP_STATE_INFO.Flags
member.summary: The structure specifying whether the property is present.

summary.para: A member of the enumeration specifying the whether the configuration object is enabled or disabled.
This can be used to disable a URL Group or Server Session.
